value.title: How to build a CI/CD pipeline for API Management, Part 2 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Miao Jiang joins Scott Hanselman to demonstrate a sample CI/CD pipeline implemented using Azure DevOps and Azure API Management DevOps resource kit. The sample follows the suggested approach that was introduced in Build a CI/CD pipeline for API Management, Part 1 (https://aka.ms/azfr/574/yt).  Azure

value.title: How to configure VPN integration in Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics
value.excerpt: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics (ATA) helps members of Security Operation Centers gain a valuable insight into the security of their Active Directory environment. In this video we will discuss how to integrate VPN (virtual private network) connection events to Advanced Threat Analytics.   For more

value.title: Quickly build data integration pipelines using templates in Azure Data Factory | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Gaurav Malhotra joins Lara Rubbelke to show how to use predefined Azure Data Factory pipeline templates to get started quickly with Azure Data Factory thereby reducing the development time for building data integration projects. value.title: What is Continuous Integration? | One Dev Question: Abel Wang
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Cloud Developer Advocate Abel Wang explains how Azure DevOps provides developer services to support teams to plan work, collaborate on code development, and build and deploy applications. In this video, Abel explains the concept of Continuous Integration.   Get more information

value.title: What's new with Continuous Integration & Delivery? | Azure Friday at Build 2018
value.excerpt: Azure Friday visited various Microsoft booths in the Expo Hall at Build 2018 to learn what's new. In this episode, Donovan Brown chats with Abel Wang about continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD).  For more information, see:  • DevOps Resource Center https://aka.ms/azfr/432/01  • Visual Studio
